WRITING.TEXT: *swims in reddit waters for first time* Hey guys its true we are porting GGE on Linux and Mac (I wont lose my head if i say Mac here?), and yes in the past as we were a small team and the porting did some other people and they didn't deliver. But now its different and its coming, and i hope your bodies are ready. I wont say and dates or time because as I sad on steam forums you never know what problem can pop up, but it should be soon (as the devs said 90% of job is done). So yea bring out your chickens, cute fluffy rabbits, penguins, zombies or whatever you wanna smash with your car and be ready! =D

Cars and guns? And the awesome community? We would never give up on that one!! Just when there is a proces that takes several months it kinda doesn't make sense that every 3-4 days devs come and say "hey guys soon" Id be pissed as well hahah. But yea we will always keep an eye on GGE to give you guys the best experience possible.
SCUM wont be a battle royal. Ofc you can go around a try to kill everything but SCUM will be more Survival/RPG oriented.
Online games are a 2 sided coin. The sooner you accept that you will see yourself improve ^^
All the he said and for me sometimes it helps to change to role I play. I usually rotate between mid, adc and jungle.
If someone would put his dick as a scale you wouldnt see it from the balls that would ocupy the whole room

WRITING.TITLE: This game is awesome, and i wonder about 1 thing..
WRITING.TEXT: Hey everyone I got this game few days ago since its free (been wanting the game since the release but $$ is a problem). As im playing the game I enjoy the hell out of it, tho didnt try the MP aspect of the game yet. The thing that gots me wondering is in the end game when you take the top cars and the cars you start with (atm mine is 370Z) if you tune them all up to the max. Are they on par? Like from a real side of view all cars should be able to be equally fast but from the gaming side progress and unlocking should maybe have an advantage. I ask this because i see few cars in the early game that I really really like, and I would have no problem driving them for the whole game just want to know if its even worth doing that, if later on they will just fall off performance vise.

I want to see a diamond player who does that unranked to diamond but that he starts from bronze 5. Just so to see how much can he do with a bad team. Yes there will be games when he can solo win but i really really really think that wont happen a lot.
But lets say i enjoy SP and im not playing MP. Does it matter then?
The devils biggest victory is making you believe that he doesnt exist.
Thanks for the feedback I appreciate it big time ^^

The mob doesnt exist? Either he is an idiot (from your story id say he is a lot of things just not stupid) or he makes jokes about it because he is actually in it. Tho the italian mob isnt really "working" anymore most of them went legit. Id say 70% for a cult and 30% for mob, adn 100% you are fucked =D

Dont think think you can do anything here. The only thing is purifing the whole land and that means digging up all 71 corpses (or how many are there), and burning them. Get out as soon as possible. Its a miracle you lived there as long as you did. But if you feel things are taking turn for the worse you should get out as soon as possible. Go to the grandparents for time being literally anywhere.
We had some talk about VR but nothing is set in stone. I think we should first make the game haha =D
As we are working in UE4 its supported and a possibility. But as we are a smaller team at the release the game will be windows only.
Its gonna be 1P and 3P, AND its gonna be MP and SP =D
You will be able to change from 1 person to 3 person in game not depending on server.

Yep we grew up on those games like a lot other people and when we sit down and talked what we could do we noticed that there are no games like those anymore so we gave it a shoot with GGE and even the game genre is not on the hype it was well received! =D

All th DLCs we made are included in the game so nope no microtransactions or dlcs anymore =D Tbh I kinda lost track of that about year and a half if you dont take DLC in count. Hahah about 4 times we came back with the DLCs (tho there are only 2 DLCs the rest were just updates)
Nostalgia for some epic old school car carnage haha I answered that on the first post ^^ about year and a half
Sadly I didnt get any copies to give away =/

From DLCs we had only 2. Full metal frenzy: #8226; Zagreb arena: a totally true-to-life depiction of the old downtown area of the Croatian capital, where the developers of this game reside ! #8226; Cowboy arena: a huge wild west map where dirt rules and anything goes. #8226; Two new cars: the Stallion and the Rhino JTL. For that extra muscle. #8226; All new female announcer. #8226; Two new power-ups, Invisibility amp; Stun Grenades (who threw that???). #8226; Three new games modes: Dominator, Destruction Derby and Domination Derby . #8226; New police skin. No-one drives like the Feds... And Full metal zombie: #8226; A total of 22 zombie variants, from plain old regular zombies to ax wielding maniacs, to giant undead zombie animals carrying explosives, plus a minigun boss. #8226; All new arena: Warburg, a huge new city map. #8226; New car: the Kaiju GTR, a fast iconic Japanese sports and drag racing car. #8226; Two new game modes: Defend the Base and Survival. #8226; New military skin. Bust those Zs like GI Joe... And we had lots of updates with minor addons that we didnt want to charge for because as said they were minor =D

PS4 is coming next year deffo. And right now we are working on a totally new project but after that is done, yep chances for GGE 2 are big because it was our first game and we love it and see lots of room to get bigger and better
Oh boy im not good at those but ill give it a try. Khm...Blow of some steam after a hard working day by shooting mini nukes at cars with a blow up doll as your co-driver!

The thing that I love is the humor and the vibe you get from it. Yea you blow up stuff with tons of weapons but still kinda have that funny chill vibe if needed...and zombie buffalos we have zombie buffalos that are annoying as hell.

Ah yes the Mp thats a huge set back we wont deny that one. As I talked with the tech team and what they said to me is that the Xbox One is a pretty closed platform, and that we just couldnt make it work with the dedicated servers and the experience that we have on the PC.

As most small teams will tell you the biggest foe is time. Deadlines, tensions, mistakes all of that gets much bigger when time presses. I dont know about that as i was not in the team at that point and forgot to ask that sorrryyy...but will try to find out the answer!! Pizza? where? give me!
Should I take it as sold? =D
Okay got the answer. We wanted to add cockpit view and a dynamic day night cycle but at that time we were just a too small team to make it happen in time
Today! =D
Im not sure if you can compare those 2 games x)
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/gas-guzzlers-extreme/brqh5gkv7912
No there isnt a split screen option =/
Thank you for the nice words means a lot to us! ^^
The Xbox couldnt handle a split screen without a drastic visual degrade
I dont think so hahah
oh dang it. gonna survive somehow =/
We also work on a new project and time is also a big factor and manpower. Gas guzzlers was made by 6 people so I assure you laziness and inexperience is not even close to why there is no multiplayer.
Hmmm hard to decide but if I had to pick one id go with the local developers that made Serious Sam 1 =D
Sadly not only SP =/
Nope splitscreen wont be a feature sadly, and we also dont have it on PC.

Im not trying to offend anyone or downgrade the Xbox. This is what I have been told. Im sure the team had a reason why. Yes time, resources and manpower were the biggest factor. And also there was some other technical issue. Sorry if i sounded rude =/
Well our new project will have that and it looks stunning. but thats a topic for another time and place ^^
You paid the first rent..what about the second?
Ayyyyy thanks everyone who was a part of the AMA I had a blast time with you all hope to see you all again on another!! Take care everyone!!
We will have some testing before the release next year and when that time comes trust me everyone will know. But Ill put a post up here as well so you guys can be informed =D

WRITING.TITLE: Steam page is up and running!!

WRITING.TEXT: Its not really gonna be the main focus. Regarding firearms, you will be able to find them and have them for a long time (if you take care of it) you will be even able to craft some improvised guns, and bullets. When we say prioritize we mean that in most cases you would want to reslove a situation with melee as its more conviniente in a hostile world filled with enemies. But hey if you wanna go guns blazing dont let us stop you =D

Hmm if we will have it will be after relase some time! I think the community on reddit is still small so its okay if we have just you as a mod that drops in from time to time. If then things start rolling in the future big time its gonna be easy to pick some people from the community to moderate.
We still didnt decide that one. But when the time comes for testing everyone will have all the info needed.
Our lead game designer answered this question (and lots more) in detail on our steam forums! So check it out for more infro! http://steamcommunity.com/app/513710/discussions/0/152390648075150883/

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM - Next gen survival
WRITING.TEXT: Good day fellow survivalists! My name is subject4198 and I'm the community manager from Gamepires the studio behind SCUM. Maybe some of you stumbled here and there on SCUM and some of you see it for the first time. I'm here to tell you in few short sentences what its about and leave some links that you can check out if you get interested! SCUM evolves the multiplayer open world survival game with unprecedented levels of character customization, control, and progression where knowledge and skills are the ultimate weapons for long-term survival. Players will balance base level needs with knowledge-based skills to manage everything from nourishment, metabolic rate, and body mass to weapons proficiency, combat style, and security systems hacking. Dominate the island with your skills, cunning, and strategies to achieve higher levels of game and receive powerful gifts from corporate sponsors and, if you happen to slip up and die, get resurrected by the show #8217;s producers with all your valuable skills still intact. SCUM is built with Unreal Engine 4 co developed with Croteam and published by Devolver Digital. Its set to launch on PC via Early Access in 2017. Feel free to ask any questions and I will answer them as fast as possible! (A lot of gameplay question have been answere by our Creative Director and Project lead on SCUM on our steam page.) [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/SCUMgame/) [Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/app/513710) [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ScumGame/) [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ScumGame/) [Blog](https://scumgame.com/)

Its gonna be a persistant world (you can find some info on the islan you are playing as well on our blog that i forgot to link but will do now hahah) There are still no gameplay videos as we are still in development. Yes it will be an early access game as we are trying to break the EA hate and prove to the people that there are developers who will update the game and give people more content and most important community based content. The release date is around Q2 2017. If a person will have the courage he will be able to survive the whole time without killing or any violence at all. If he builds his character that way as we will have a RPG style skill based mechanic (more on that soon!!)

We are still working with the log out, at the moment you disappear, now we have to make that work in a way that you cant just log out when you are in danger and return few minutes later because that makes no sense in a survival game, its still all WiP =) About stashing loot and keeping loot we talked about in one of our posts on our blog so check it out! Base building is in our minds and we talked a bit about it but its nothing sure yet and if we decide on it its gonna come in later stages

Thanks for the nice words =) we are trying to make a game that will stand out. And yes, if there will be base building it will be more like fortifying current constructions than building bases from scratch, as in our world i doubt youd have the time to build a bunker haha. *cough* booby traps will be a thing *cough*

WRITING.TITLE: Stamina update 2 #8211; S is for Science
Stamina update 2 #8211; S is for Science
Stamina update 2 #8211; S is for Science
How do players perceive the complexity behind a game?
WRITING.TEXT: Hello everyone! I'm new here and hope I will not break any rules with the stuff I say ( i have read the guidlines several times) =D. Back on topic, the game we are currently working on is a survival game, and we are really trying ti bring a real feel to it, and the thing that bothers me is that on the surface (lets take stamina system for example) 2 games can have similar systems and work in a similar way but the technical part behind them can be light years apart. How do you show the player that the difference is bigger and impactful. Yes i guess you can say that the gameplay will show it and thats true, but as I saw in a lot of games the better you do it the more "oh yea i guess its good" it gets.

WRITING.TITLE: Our Stamina system
WRITING.TEXT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Ti5LgSMKWQ Hello everyone! This is a short presnetation of the stamina system we have in our survival game SCUM. More info about it you can check on our dev blog. I will try to answer everyquestion! =D

[SCUM - Stamina update 2 - S is for Science](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Ti5LgSMKWQ) Hello everyone! Our latest update on SCUM is the stamina system, and everything behind it! In short few notes what is it about: There are several crucial parameters that are taken in consideration for Stamina level determination: * Max Stamina - the initial value * Current Stamina * Maximum Stamina * Stamina Change Rate * Stamina Reserve * Maximum Stamina Reduction [Blog](https://scumgame.com) | [Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/app/513710) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ScumGame/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ScumGame)

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM - How does inertion work in our game!

WRITING.TEXT: Yes they will, as it is in real life.

[Inertia](https://scumgame.com/2017/01/27/inertia/) Hello everyone! Today we have a little video showing the inertion system in SCUM. We recommend also checking the full post if you want the fancy explanation (we used science terms) =D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_QbNSS3wbC8 [Blog](https://scumgame.com) | [Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/app/513710) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ScumGame/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ScumGame) **Bonus question** Yes I play them and love them haha. The first one was Rappelz in the old days it was really fun but now i became P2W =/ now Tera is my favorite
Hahaha you will save some thousands of bucks whent he game comes out =D. The release is around Q2 this year so just few months ahead.

You cant be more correct sir, and we agree with you. But thats why we also have a first person camera mode, and we balanced out the "peeking" with use of skills. You can read about that in our blog posts. More precise the post about stealth https://scumgame.com/2016/12/20/stealth-skill/ tho the 1 and 3 person angle is still under work and we are improving it.

In the later stages of development we plan to put in some transporation device, bycicel, motorbike, car, dragon (joking but that be awesome). Tho it wouldnt just be find it and drive it. There would be some fixing needed probablly depends on the damage of the car. Some skill could also help you fix it faster / fewer parts needed, and maintain it easier and even drive it better. Once the time comes for that we will make sure that the community gives its oppinions so we can go in that way. =D

Hello. Regarding base building, we have fixed bases located on the island, and when you capture them you get bonuses like food, weapons, ammo etc. But we are also considering the solution that the player builds his own base. Although its not planed for EA, as we want it to be more than just a box and a door on the level.
Thanks!! If you have any more questions just drop them here or on steam forums and we will answer it as soon as possible =D

This is an awesome suggestion, tho i see some problems regarding twitch and streaming sites. But the concept of players being the audience to other player and themself is quiet interesting. Thank you sir for this suggestion =D
We will give our best to give you guys the best game possible, and we will work with the community closely and listen to what it has to say and go with their wishes as much as possible

Hello everyone! Today im back with more SCUM news more speciffic our unarmed melee combat and we explained in the basicis how it works. You can expect it around Q2 this year

WRITING.TITLE: New video? fuck yea its a new video
WRITING.TEXT: Here it is guys, a new video on SCUM. Check it out and give me your thoughts and comments!! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dn-qfKPnKtk

WRITING.TITLE: [SHOW OFF] Shooting skill in SCUM!
WRITING.TEXT: How we made shooting in SCUM real and awesome! =D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dn-qfKPnKtk

Kudos to the post its pretty on point. I will try to show you the developers side of this year long problem. Its kinda pretty easy, I really doubt that there are developers with an attitude that goes "meh we make games for PC no need for a controller, those console pesants should pick up KB amp;M". Mostly the problem is the number of key bindings. If there are more than the controller supports you have a problem. You cant drop out some functions just to put controllers in the picture it would be unfair big time, and balancing out the aspect of functionality between KB amp;M and Controllers is kinda impossible. We in Gamepries didnt exclude the option for controllers in SCUM we would love to have it really. Just we need to finish up the game and the controlls for it for KB amp;M first to see what we can do for controllers. If its gonna be possible to make the game for controllers rest assured that we will if it wont be able we will tell you guys why we werent able to make it. On a side note I have huge respetc for people who play FPS like game on controllers, as i have no clue how can someone be so precise with it.

I just want to say one thing before it gets out of controll as i saw it many times before. KB amp;M is not supperior to a Controller or vice versa its all about personal preferences so lets stay at that and not go into a whats better competition. I personaly love controllers for racing games (a steering wheel is even better but the good ones are shit ton expensive|). We will look into controllers and consoles as well just for the time being its not our priority. Im not saying that it matters less just we dont want to jump on other things while having for example: gamebraking bugs, big fps drops, lag problems etc.. We are alwayas as transparent with our community as possible, and you will be always in loop of whats happening or whats not happening and for what reason its not happening =)

WRITING.TITLE: Wrong game name in description
WRITING.TEXT: Hello evryone. I have a issue, on our latest update video of the game SCUM after some time in the description showed up that the game is Wildlands, and i cant find a way to remove it, and our game is not on the list. So i wonder what can be done in that regard. Here is a screenshot of the issue http://prntscr.com/f0y3jz Thanks in advance!
Tried that already, and its not working.

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM - Camouflage preview
WRITING.TEXT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZRY4mJzLN8
We will try to bring SCUM in every part of the world =D
*Gamepires =D

Hey mate we have no problem with that. From the recent games that i saw that went to EA and overall, gamedevelopers are popping out more than weed with a mind set "Lets make some fast money". But then few months into development suprise suprise making games isnt as easy as the thought. Gamepires is not a new studio we are here for aprox 5-6 years, and the core team are old school vets in the industry. Check out the game that they made with 6 people. Gas guzzlers Extreme, and as you all know by now we are really open with you guys so you are always in the loop.

Nope that one sadly cant do. You have to understand that we arent a 60 man company, 14 people are working on SCUM, and you never know what problem can pop up that will halt the development. So we rather dont say anything regards that than say a relase date and the fail to make it.
+1 from the Devs

We hope and believe so. I really dont want to misslead you guys because before being a community manager im also a gamer, and I know the feelings and the position you are comming from. In this industry no matter how much problems/situations (good or bad) you expect there will pop up 3 times more that you just could not predict. But I assure you that we are giving our best and max to deliver SCUM as soon as possible and in the best state as possible.

In SCUM everything you do gives you experience and goes into some skill/status so there will always be a feel that you did something. Regarding item spawning etc... There will be servers with various rates (community made servers) and lots of other options. Everyone will be able to find the perfect server for him. If not well you can always play solo the way you like with the rates you like. =)

Yea, you buy the game, you can join on other servers (or get your own) or you can play on our own local server alone and chill, and all paramters that we will put in to be adjustable you will be able to change. Item spawn rates, weapon spawn rates, enemy spawn rate etc.. (those are just examples of what might be in)
Thats a top secret, if we tell you we gonna need to kill you =/
All of the devs understand that, they are just lazy and time to time money hungry =D
yup =D

WRITING.TITLE: Small update on player feedback of sCAT video.

WRITING.TEXT: Every action in scum has a counter balance in some way. When you die you lose all your gear but skills will stay intact, as we dont like to punish players that much. Thats our point of view, but of course there are players who like a hardcore approach to the game and we respect that one as well thats why people will be able to make their own servers and mod them in the way they like them so everyone can find something that suits them.
Here you go guys http://steamcommunity.com/app/513710/discussions/0/2183537632736507701/

WRITING.TITLE: Some eye candy while you guys wait for the new video
Promise we are working on a new video aswell =D

WRITING.TEXT: And what did exactly happened? I don't really understand it from this what you wrote?

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM - Headbanging into the sunset time lapse [Pre Alpha]

WRITING.TEXT: 1. Skills and fame points wont be transferable between servers (at least not for now). 2. We will have certain event types in the game, and for now its only that we did not look into mechanics like paring the most/least popular players ect.. 3. Fame points (you can look on that like a rank) will be one of the core mechanics in the game so it will be on every server.
There will be official servers. I guess you can take that as vanilla.

WRITING.TITLE: Awesome article on scum from venturaBeat

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you for the nice words. For now we still dont have the sleep mechanic worked out. But once we do we will let you guys know =)
Feed me suggestions and ides my minions muahahahah =D

WRITING.TITLE: Any clans still active?
WRITING.TEXT: Gonna try HoN again after few years. Wondered if there are people who would like to play?

WRITING.TITLE: My first 2 games after 3 years.
WRITING.TEXT: Okay, yesterday I played HoN after some good 3 years, and I really need some confirmation from you guys here if its the case for all games. So my first game was a normal game (not for the leaderboards), and the moment we entered hero select screen shit went south, really really really fast. The last time (3 years ago) when I played there were heroes for mid, jungle, suicide, support, carry or sometimes duo top. Depending on the communication what people want to play. Okay so we enter the hero select screen, and the only thing anyone wrote was me "Can I please support I didnt play the game in a long time" ofc no one responded but hey who knows they will get it when I pick Glacius. I was on a lane with Ra, mid was pyro, top were polly and cant remember the last hero. Overall I didnt mind the weird picks as people can go anywhere with anything and make it work if they know how to play. But you know those games where it feels that everything is just all over the place like nothing makes any sense of what the hell is going on? Yea multiply that by 5. Then I went to play a game for the leaderboards as I thought maybe people take that more serious than casual games, and boy was I wrong. Exactly the same stuff happened. I tried to communicate with my team of what to do where to go ect.. but nope like im talking to a wall. I mean even for a player that played this game before and has a lot of games under his belt. I dont feel like playing anymore at all. How does Frostburn expect to gain people when the game is in such a chaotic state. Okay I get that its not really their fault for me getting "unlucky" with my games and teammates. But i bet 90% of new people who would like to try to get into the game wont look at it that way but will just uninstall the game after few games. So my question is. Is that really the state of the community/game right now or did I have bad luck and those are like 2/10 games that happen.
I am from Eu and I play on Eu servers. Guess youre right. But that takes the question how far can you get with such teammates.
Good point good point.
Everything you need to know is written on our discord under the christmas event section.
Thats totally fine and if its your opinion we respect it. Not every game is for everyone. =)
No worries we already looked into that and have ideas and plans for it. =D
But thank you for your opinion and suggestion nonetheless!
Thanks for the input we shall look into it. =D
As we (the devs) cant really influence reddit as its community driven. But can you try to keep it civil. And thank you for the input.
Ill just say that we will have fun events that you can chose if you want to participate or not. =)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oPhjvMIfkH0 amp;t Did you watch this video?
NVGs won't be easy to find. So about 90% of people will need to rely on alternative vision sources. Like flashlights and torches.
Well, thats an interesting idea for sure x). But for now, it's not planned, maybe later. Tho we do plan to have interactions/taunts that are not gender specific.

It will be closer to the end of Q1 or beginning of Q2, than to the end of Q2. The main reason is that we decided to add some extra features that were not planned for EA release. These features will separate SCUM from all other survival/BR games and also will provide new players with some new game mechanics that are fully unique to SCUM. This was hard decision to make but at the end, we decided to do it before the release. It is our opinion that we have only one chance so it #8217;s better to do it right. Also, these elements will provide players with enough things to keep them occupied before we make the first update of the game. This first update after release will be crucial since the game will be tested by huge numbers of players and we will have to patch/fix issues ASAP. Because of that majority of the team will be probably working on the bugs and not gameplay related things. So even if it seems that we are being late we are actually planning to be more effective after the release. Hope you understand.
https://i.imgur.com/HkPOzEH.jpg?1
Yes we will have VOIP in game =)

Damn it...*Crosses out pony hats raining from loot boxes" Jokes aside, we dont plan to have any p2w mechanics. If we will have something that can be bought with extra money it be skins like you said. I personally love the system RUST has but we will see which way we will go if we will go that way.
Yes we will make it able to you will keep your character preset that you made. =)
Hey, thats an awesome idea. And sure you can use all assets you need for it. =D
0.35 euros and a wallet aint enough atm =/. Next time try with your soul.
You mean in character creation? If that then yes we will have character customization.
We are fixing them already =D, and ofc we will fix them all the time.
Thank you and fuck you too =D lt;3

And we agree 100%. That's why we look into the option to disable and enable the outline option (also other various mechanics). So people will be able to play in their own style of game. We are not sure if we will be able to get this running from day 1 as it includes more parameters *insert some tech stuff talk that I did not understand*. But we heard you guys on that topic on more than 1 occasion, and we will do our best to make it satisfying for everyone. =D
*Sad pepe*

Yea I mean server wide. =) Regarding servers we will see if there will be official servers that will have that disabled. (Cant promise anything) But once its available (as said mentioned that wont be available from day 1) you will be able to set it up for your own server. Now regarding your own server, there will be 2 types of "your own server" 1. You can buy a server from our official server provider G portal. And you will be able to do that from day 1. 2. Once we release server files that will enable you to host your own server. But that wont be from day 1 as well but later on.
Nice ideas all around this thread. For now, we will have some time frame that will start a countdown before you log out. But yea we will improve that later on for sure. =D

The thing with the fame system is to draw attention from the new players that are just starting to the ones that are..well more famous. I mean we still want make our game that way so everyone can do what they want. So its up to you how you want to play, where there be bullies that will aim to camp new players? Probably yes, but as said with the fame system we want to throw the focus of from that, but yet not so much so that the choice of "do what you want" is removed. Its all about the balance, and we will give our best to get to that balance.
We do not have a set price yet. It will depend on the state the game will be released and how many features it will have. Take this as a definite answer. =)
Q2 is the release. And all videos are ingame made. =D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8J7N_dQbcs Newest one.
Good point, with a fair sense of doubt. +1 =D
Its been mostly quiet as I have been sick for the last week, and I'm the CM. So sorry for that, as we pride ourselves on community interacting. But I,m back now!
Yup, this is totally true. But also take into account that Rare (SoT devs) have around 200 employees. And we have 16! =D Tho we are trying our best to be here with you guys!
Yes, stuff like that is planned. But atm we have some bigger priorities than that

Yes, we would like to have it to such a degree. The only problem with that atm are animations, we need a lot (and I mean a LOT) of them to have most of the wound situations. Like if you miss an arm, finger, leg ect... We will have hit zones on the body, to simulate real life as much as possible. We have some ideas for healing that will be located in safe zones, but all that is still in the works. So can't say too much as it could all be changed.
Don't be haha. Nothing wrong with a small dose of healthy scepticism. =D Thank you for the nice words, means a lot!!
We will see about that. First it will be for SP. If it will work for MP we will add it in. Ofc depends on the community and what they would like.

As @Magor57 stated. In a game like this, you cant punish people for doing anything really (besides cheating ofc) as you can do whatever you want. Regarding freshspawn people and the "famous ones," we can try to make it so it's uninteresting to hunt them. And yeas you will lose fame points on death. Before that you will be able to use a certain amount to maybe get some gear back, skills ect.. And this is all still in the works, the whole fame system. We will make it as good as possible with the input from you guys.
Interesting idea. Not sure how much we can do as this takes a lot of work, and we are kinda busy with the game. =D
Valid points, I'll write them down. And as said, all of this is still in the works. I said a rough outline of the idea ofc its gonna be tweaked and balanced as much as possible.

WRITING.TITLE: We are at PAX East!!
WRITING.TEXT: For all you reddit people. This year we are at PAX east, so if you want to try some SCUM drop by! And have a chat with us if you want!!
Yes we plan to add that. Not from the day 1 of Ea as we are limited by animations, but we will add it in the future.
We have our own both besides the devolver one. =D
We are doing some work on it thats why its down. We will update once its live!
Sorry totally top secert, cant say we are changing everything so it looks better =/
The old site is up, there were few problems that the web team encountered. They are Canadian, don't want to tell you all the excuses we got from them. =D
Ayyyy we do not know about the wild west but east Europe, now living here that's some real survival. =D
All settled!
Guys Q2 is a 100%. This can be tomorrow or June 30. Sadly we cant go more precise
Regarding modes. We will see what we can do. We will try to add the ones most wanted by you guys.

Hey Eli, yes we are active everywhere (or at least I try to be as much as possible). A lot of answer can be found in our FAQ (jace posted it). But before that, I highly recommend to watch our videos. https://www.youtube.com/user/TheGamepires/videos From Inertia till the end.

Ayyy time that I pop in here. SCUM is inspired by a lot of games. But we are not trying to make a better version of DayZ, EFT, PUBG, H1Z1, Ark ect.. We are making something totally new something that has not been seen before. You can find online our interviews that we gave on PAX. I'm pretty sure that we and dayz found the same good inspirations for items and made them by it. Even if we did copy it or even if they copy something from us in the future. I really do not see it as a problem. If devs upgrade their games with good features and mechanics and improve the game overall I would never see it as a problem. You still choose what game you want to play no one is forcing you to play something else. But that's my personal opinion. A similar situation happened with AC: Origins. I met a person who was "They have totally no originality they copied Witcher 3 questions marks on the map for undiscovered situations". I asked him does it work like in Witcher 3? He said that it does, and then I asked him again if he likes that system in Witcher 3 he also said yes. So where is the problem? You got another game with a system that you're familiar and on top of that it works and you like it. Isn't that a win for everyone? SCUM will have more than enough of original features (it already has tons of them). If someone can make something totally new that was never seen before and make it work well, great, respect to that person. But also I do not see the problem if you see something that works and people like. Why not use it? Its a win for everyone. I'm starting to repeat my self SO final verdict. We are not copying anyone, we see what you guys like and add it to SCUM, we also have tons of original stuff that we hope will attract new players. For any more questions, I'll be more than happy to answer. =)
Obv the best ones were with me. ;D

If you talk about the drone hovering over players, that was just an idea that popped into my mind at that point. Ofc if it can be made possible so it's balanced we will make it. We are totally open to suggestions as well. =D
http://prntscr.com/j7vl1r Here you go. Some of the current benchmarks from our testers. Ofc they are prone to changes.
Well, you will be able to get stuff from events. But it wont be crucial to join them. We like to balance things out so everyone can find their play style =)
Maybe, who knows. If people will ask for it we will see in what manner we can add it. But survival is still our main focus.

Yea as people said. For now, they are just a few presets. But we will try to add more customization in later stages. I have in mind already an awesome tattoo artist who is hooked for our game and he would like to do some custom ones just for SCUM. So we will see what we can do about that. =D
https://scumgame.com/en/news/encounters You can check more here about our "zombies".
I can tell you that I never heard of NDS. And we are not affiliated with them in any way. =D
Deathmatch mode where everyone is naked and has crohn disease, and the only weapon is the one you shit out? 1 hit 1 kill?

WRITING.TITLE: Shout out to our reddit SCUM
WRITING.TEXT: Just a small shoutout to all you guys who follow us here. As we are the least active here. But we did not forget you guys we love you all the same. Thanks for supporting us lt;3
Thanks for letting us know. I think they are good for now pvtjace is the boss here so he takes the shots for for staff and everything =D
Its gonna be pay to play =D
Yo guys, there won't be any hidden release dates. We will announce the release date. When? When we announce it.
You have benchmarks on our official discord server. =)
Interesting idea for sure. I will write it down. =D even tho we had some ideas around fear already. But thank you nonetheless

WRITING.TITLE: Discord is over 5000!!!
WRITING.TEXT: Today we broke 5,000 members on our official @discordapp server. Big thanks to our whole community and much love from the whole SCUM team. https://discord.gg/scum
As soon as we will have an official date you guys will know it. We do everything transparent with you guys. =)
Thank you and we will. =D

WRITING.TITLE: Video Sunday!! Check out this awesome flyover made by our tester soBr0kEn!

WRITING.TEXT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5tTFP2Fg2OI amp;t here you go. 7h of shooting.
http://prntscr.com/jngzmr
Fair enough, what does not look good to you?
We are aware of some of the UI problems. The UI is being reworked as well, and one thing to consider is that youtube compressed the video a lot and it's much darker than it should be.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/444216579941466112/451010743190552576/unknown.png How it really looks. But as said it is being reworked.
You're fired 5/7 =D
Ohh good that you mentioned I mistyped as well...fired 100/10 =D

Hey hey and welcome to our subreddit. We already have in mind (and did some testing with hair growth) facial hair and hair growth. We would love to make it able that you can rock different haircuts and beards. But for now, it's not a priority. But thanks for the suggestion nonetheless hope to see more of you here. =D
God damn why do I always miss the o in the video....
Its a shuriken =D
U igri se trenutno ne moze okretat janje no mozda jednog dana ubacimo i to u igru. =D https://www.reddit.com/r/SCUMgame/

Hey guys just to chime in to clear possible confusion. Nvidia will be giving away codes that can be activated once the game is released not sooner. And the price 30$ is just an approximate from their side due to legal reasons. So 2 main points. 1. The game WON'T be one sale on E3 2. The game price is NOT confirmed. 3. The game release date is also NOT confirmed until told from official sources.

Hey guys just to chime in to clear possible confusion. Nvidia will be giving away codes that can be activated once the game is released not sooner. And the price 30$ is just an approximate from their side due to legal reasons. So 2 main points. 1. The game WON'T be one sale on E3 2. The game price is NOT confirmed. 3. The game release date is also NOT confirmed until told from official sources.

Hey guys just to chime in to clear possible confusion. Nvidia will be giving away codes that can be activated once the game is released not sooner. And the price 30$ is just an approximate from their side due to legal reasons. So 2 main points. 1. The game WON'T be one sale on E3 2. The game price is NOT confirmed. 3. The game release date is also NOT confirmed until told from official sources.

Guess its time to put my head on the chopping block =D. The robots were here from day 1. You can see Mr.Smiley on our first art screen posted in 2016 (he is on the right behind the fence). And the whole game is about a TV show, that's with the drones and stuff (We also had drones in some of our previous videos). And there are things tied to the lore that we still did not reveal yet. SCUM is still a survival game in its nature, just there will be a lot of other goodies going on on the island to keep you entertained..or the people watching =D

The decision for the delay was made on Friday. And because the people who want to get the game we do not want to release a game that is filled with bugs and problems under the cover of EA, at least keep it to a minimum. Also what we forgot to account for is Steam summer sale that starts soon, and E3 itself. We took a call that it's not the best time for a release. And as said the decision was made on Friday.
Nope, still a survival game, and it will never be a BR game. The closest we may get to BR is a BR mode inside the game...in the company with many more modes like TDM, Deathmatch, CTF ect..
We did not lie, the decision was made on Friday. We are still working hard on the game to make it as good as possible. You can find more info in other posts and steam regarding this.
Thank you, much love lt;3
I can't go into too much detail about it. But on the release day, you will know exactly what your getting, and we plan to publish a roadmap on release.

I totally agree with you on that one. But as said I can't go too much into detail, but you will get all the info you need to make sure if the game is for you or not. =) and ofc the info that you will get will be unbiased.

Nope, totally our fault. We are a small team, and we do not have any management just for that. So kinda everyone does everything. Ofc most of people are just in the development. I'm as well in development but also a CM, PR and some other stuff as well. We are doing our best to make SCUM as good as possible for release. But in Game dev even if you account in problems there will be some that you never expected. So its really really reaallllyyy hard to make a set date if you are a small studio. We made a mistake we learned from it. And big thanks to everyone who understands lt;3
Ummm...those 2 are different types of genres. And we won't be a BR game but a survival simulation.

I mean thats also a viewpoint. But if we go by that every game where you can die is a survival game? Maybe go with the notion that survival games tend to backtrack when you die? E.G you lose stuff/progress when you die? Edit 1: Its a big area I think. But regarding SCUM or main focus is simulation and hc survival. Not arcade shooting, if that makes sense

Nice work there, just 2 things. 1) You wont have a map like that in SCUM when its released 2) This is the most outdated map of the island from 2016, it changed regarding hot spots, cities ect.. But nice work non the less!
The shape of the island is the same, roads are different, village positions, a lot of POI are not here as well.

Hey guys. I'm here to shine some light regarding the stream. First of all, you need to know that on E3 where only 2 SCUM devs, as the rest of us are heads deep in development. We were aware that 2 people are wayyyy to less to handle all the meetings but we just couldn't spare more people. Saying that the only time able to stream was that 1h window on Friday where the press meeting they had cancelled it. And they did not go catch a breath or rest for a bit but they went to stream. "But why couldn't you put someone from devolver to stream the game" yes we could but that person could not answer any questions really. They guys were flat out tired and exhausted. We all have only the best intentions for SCUM but mistakes were made and will probably be made in the future, as we are all people and we make mistakes. We will try to make up for it with streams from the office (we plan to start that next week with a Q amp;A) and try to do them as many as possible, also we will publish the longer version of the trailer that you saw on E3 in the next 2 weeks, as well with the price of SCUM. Thank you all for your understanding, much love from the whole SCUM team lt;3 lt;3. And please please please, try to avoid trash talking anybody, we always welcome constructive criticism and advice. But venting and trash talking over spilt milk won't do anything. Again thank you and much love lt;3

WRITING.TITLE: Taking merch to a whole new level

WRITING.TEXT: It was not pointed towards anyone specific. And we are well aware it could (and should) been better, and we will give our best to make it so. In the next streams, you will see my pretty face and we will go through Q amp;A gameplays or anything you guys would like to see. =)
Hi new guy I'm dad. In case you log off your gear goes with you and reappears when you log back in. Cooking will be optional, you will be able to find cans of food ect..

Well, it is possible. I mean depends on what food you eat. If you eat just candy all the time ofc no. But most canned food has a good nutritional value, mixing it with some fruits as well for vitamins (there are a lot of fruit trees) you should be fine. But some basic cooking like meat, vegetable ect.. will not be too hard to come by.
For now no, and we did not really think about that. But if people would want that we can take a look into it.
There will be a party mechanic we will see how much of "friendly" visibility we will have.

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM price reveal!
WRITING.TEXT: Excited to announce that SCUM will have an introductory $19.99 price when it enters Steam Early Access this August! The price will increase throughout Early Access as new content and features are added. Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/513710
Lol same
And as it pans out Spielberg does not take a beer as a payment option =/

My 2 cents on this. So yea we will have fortification in the game (not from day 1 but it's being worked on). Regarding storing stuff, you can already put your stuff in cabinets that you search/loot. Ofc there is always a possibility someone will come and loot it and find your gear. If we will make storage that you will be able to lock in some way we will need to make it in a way that ties into skills, and also have a counterpart of it that would be lockpicking. So it's not just make a storage of some sorts and you are set.
Because of reasons =D Just a small clip to show you guys how the song animations were made. =D
As soon as we will have more info on it we will let you know!
Not yet
http://prntscr.com/k0emg2 *flies away*
Just to make it clear we are already pushing the boundaries of UE4 regarding map size. I do not promise we will expand the map. But you never know what can happen.

Just to chime in for a moment. The skill as in the red outline/red blob or call it whatever you want it is removed due us reworking the whole awareness skill. The red outline was just 1 feature of that skill.
We will see what we feel works best.
Props to you and your dad for being in our game =D

Imma try to answer that one. =D 1) Yes, also the idea is that the buildings you fortify give you more than just a place to stash your loot. Maybe if its a workshop more tools to craft better items to maybe repair broken ones etc.. And not all building will be the same. You will be able to have from small houses to big bases. (some of them you wont be able to fortify alone) 2) Its gonna be various, from a simple try to lockpick a door, and youre in a group of players trying to break in a base where is another group of players to various means like maybe brute force, or stealthy. 3) SCUM will also have a clan like system, for starters it will be basic but we will upgrade it later on. We will also have in-game missions. Raiding I explained above. Look if I told you that we have every little detailed planned out to the dot for SCUM id be lying. Ofc we know what we want, and we have an idea how to get to that, but thats a trip, a trip that we will take with our community together. Thats why it will be an EA game and its costs 20$ in the start.

Really good suggestions. Ill write them down. For the map tier system, the idea is that the player can go anywhere. But going in the mountains in summer clothing or in a radioactive area without a hazmat suit...well it wont end well. But you can always try if you want to. All in all really nice suggestions. =)
Cant promise anything about it. But we will take a look into that for sure.

I'm a casual gamer regarding survival games, and have no problem playing the game. Yea, I also make the game that needs to be accounted for. But I know few testers that are casual and just chill and have a nice time. SCUM is made for casual players and hardcore ones.
Nahh youll be able to play with him =D
Will this make the post to flare up?
Nope, it wont xD
More closer to later August than early. You have benchmarks on our official discord so you can see how your system will handle it. =)

Sorry for the silence guys, we are tied in development big time, and don't catch all the socials. We plan to announce the date really soon as well. So stay tuned. If you want to join on our discord there you can catch all the news faster.
lt;3
We are doing our best, and your support means a lot ^^
Preach brother!
Yep yep, you will be able to stash stuff. =D
We plan to add psychological effects. From happiness, anxiety, fear etc.. Tho we will add it later on, as those will require a lot of work.
Hahahah those would be indeed fun aspects of the game with an impact. I will write that down. =D

As Phlex said, that would take a lot of time for a person to do that. And someone can just come after him and remove the things from furniture. For now we will stay on that feature and see how it pans out.
=D
I chose the name Batman.
If you will fortify a building and make it yours, items wont respawn in it.
We have event modes that give you the possibility to shoot your heart out, also maybe we can add some BR type event in the future.
For now, we have basic wound patching. But the idea is to upgrade that system from heart massages to surgeries that can only a person with high medical skill pull of.
Just imagine to get hit by that gives me shivers.
Just by crafting this thing you prove a point not to get close to you hahah xD
=o noice
I like the idea of shooting a dose of adrenaline in your friend that is injured and is not close to you. Good job!!
You are a mean person =(
No DLCs confirmed, lets not spread fake info ;).
Hey hey, valid thinking for sure. But im happy to say that youre wrong ^^ The game will come out this month, and we will announce the date any day now. =D
Sure we would like to expand the island and the game overall. But lets first finish this part of the game and then look where to expand. =D

Hey guys just to touch on the spawning mechanic. Its still in the early days, we will ofc fine tune it as time goes on so its balanced out. All that you saw in the stream is NOT the final version (maybe some things are if the work good). Nothing is set in stone, all is prone to changes, and all of the changes will go towards that, that the game feels balanced and good to play. =)

I will talk with the reddit mods to set up a possible Q amp;A for you guys so we can clear everything out, and remove the doubts and worries you may have =D in the end the game is for you awesome people lt;3

We already have our menu set with all the dishes, tho the customers will be able to add their suggestions what could improve the meals. And we can see and try it out, and if its better and the customers like it, why not keep it. =D
Gogogogog play with the man!! Id love to but will have hands full with a community after the launch. =D

Well to be honest, the idea is to escape the island. But for what will happen when you do we still need to see what scenario we will pick. We will tie it with missions once we add them to the game. Also with rewards that will come with that etc..
Oh damn. We in the bussines part tho. Hall 4.1, booth E40
You need to have a business pass for it.
Hahaha this is awesome. But boy oh boy you will get messed up =D
Imma take those 2 cents =D. Fair enough, tho that sound happens only in the events. And you dont need to join them if you dont want to. =D
How about we give the option to have it or not to have it? So people who don't want it can remove it? Through options?
The team up system will be upgraded. This is not the final version, and ill take your input into account. =D
Ayoooo wheres my mayooo. Thats our bad guys, we have some of those stuff in our builds that we make for easier and faster testing. But stress not it WONT be in the game. lt;3
What he said. =D
Soooo...map change incoming? =D
+1 to this. We will look into it once we gonna expand our medical skill to the next stages. Thank you for the suggestion lt;3
Tbh we made our game for moments like this. lt;3 Cant wait to see what you guys can come up with =D

WRITING.TITLE: SCUM is live on Steam Early Access! Welcome to SCUM Island, prisoner!!

WRITING.TEXT: The cube is of big importance of the island. In the early days of mankind when the island was still shaping, the gods used those small cubes in finding problems and issues to they can fix it faster....In short we use it to find the exact place of a bug on the island, and time to time we forget to delet it xD
If anyone is a god here, its you guys that play SCUM and support it. lt;3 You are the real heroes.
Hahahah the whole office was looking at me while I was laughing my ass off. GGWP
At one point you will forget to refound it and we will make a BBQ together in our game ;D
Just normal people who take care of their game, and the people playing it as best as they can lt;3
We might have to tweak that a bit. But yea, please do not drink a whole bottle of absinthe in real life it will kill you most likely.
We are aware of the issue and are looking into it right now. Thank you for your understanding lt;3
hahahah guess we messed up a ragdool. We will take care of it. =D
Thank you everyone for the nice words, it means the world to us lt;3
...If she leaves you Ill jump in so no worries, and thank you for the nice words and suggestions they are noted lt;3
...this may be a bug. Noted it down and will look into it.
For now you can not. But we will add that later on.
Dont think i dont see that wooden chop board that you are ready to throw into his head if things go wrong...totally not talking out of experience..
Thank you, we appreciate it from the bottom of our scumy hearts lt;3
Hey guys, thanks for the feedback. Ill shoot this thread to the people who work on them, we will continue to work on them to balance them out as good as possible. Thank you for your feedback lt;3
What have we done .-.
Nono thank you for playing our game lt;3
Hmmm the meat should spoil after 2 days, we will take a look into it.
My dad could beat up your bear with your dad...am i doing this right?
We were just trying the mute button and for us its working. We will have a deepr look into, and keep you posted.
Duly noted! Thank you for the suggestion lt;3
That one is on our todo list!

No worries thats why we are here to answer questions! We have a roadmap on steam, but we can't really say a certain timeline of what will go in regarding those. We will level ourselves with what people would like to see next and also what takes longer time to add.

WRITING.TITLE: A big thank you from the devs lt;3
WRITING.TEXT: Hello reddit folk! Just wanted to say a big thanks to all you wonderful people who help us with suggestions, bugs, feedback and the awesome funny moments. It means a lot to us. Please, keep posting here as you are as we are looking here as well and responding to your comments (we cant catch all but trying as much as possible). Also feel free to tag me in questions, suggestions etc.. and I will do my best to answer as many as possible. Again a big thank you and without you SCUM would not be where it is now. lt;3 lt;3 lt;3
